boardgame.name: Specter Ops
boardgame.description: A secret agent of A.R.K. has infiltrated a top secret Raxxon facility, attempting to complete three mission objectives before they escape _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; but they are hunted by genetically modified Raxxon Hunters. Players can choose which side they wish to join._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Specter Ops is a sci-fi, stealth ops game of hidden movement that's similar to Scotland Yard. Players are trying to locate/capture a mysterious agent, who keeps track of their sneaking via a private map. The other players take control of unique characters who must use their wits, abilities and technology to help them hunt down this infiltrator. Items like flash grenades, scanners, and the like are at the disposal of this covert agent._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: [German text first, English version below the line] Wegen einer etwas zu großzügigen Vorbestellung habe ich aktuell zwei Exemplare von Specter Ops zuviel (jeweils zuzüglich der jeweiligen Promokarten). Das Spiel ist noch originalverpackt in Folie. Versand sofort nach Bezahlung möglich, falls erwünscht gegen Aufpreis auch per Express. Standardversand innerhalb Deutschlands €4,99 (als versichertes Paket). Zahlbar per Paypal oder Überweisung. ---------------------------------------- Due to a little too enthusiastic preorder, I now have two excess copies of Specter Ops (including the two promo cards for each). Game is still shrink-wrapped. The game can be shipped immediately after payment. Express shipping possible, but probably a lot more expensive. Standard shipping within Germany is 4,99 EUR (including insurance). If ordering from another country: please check shipping prices beforehand and contact me, so I can verify the price. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll try to ship it most economically, but the price might still be high.

Plaid Hat Games (PLDSO01) The game is designed by Emerson Matsuuchi, with art by Steven Hamilton. A secret agent of A.R.K. has infiltrated a top secret Raxxon facility, attempting to complete three mission objectives before they escape. But they are hunted by genetically modified Raxxon Hunters. Players can chose which side they wish to join.

Opened but un-played and un-punched. Includes Plaid Hat Games Pre-Order Promo Cards. Item is in very good condition. I treat my games very well. If there are components inside the game they are most likely bagged in 4mm, thick bags. I ship via USPS, which is most cost effective. When I ship things I take extra measurers to mitigate any potential shipping damage. Shipping from 98012. Here’s some shipping ESTIMATES to help you get an idea of what it will cost. Your distance from my Zip Code (98012) and box weight are the biggest factors in price. Please ask ahead of time if you want to know your shipping! If you place an order and cancel it after I provide you with shipping, you will get negative feedback. Small Card Game (i.e. 6 nimmt or Hanabi) $3-$6 / USPS First Class or Priority Bubble Mailer Thin Medium Sized (i.e. Concept, Las Vegas) $8-$10 / Priority Mail Thick Medium Sized (i.e. Istanbul, King of Tokyo, Russian Railroads) $10-$13 / Priority Mail Big Box Games (i.e. Ticket to Ride, 7 Wonders) $16-$18 / Priority Mail or Parcel Post Oversized or Odd Shaped Boxes ($22-$25) / Parcel Post

This copy of Specter Ops has been played twice. All miniatures, cards, tokens, dice, and game box are in factory condition. This game has been properly stored in a child-free, pet-free and smoke-free home. I no longer have the time to play unfortunately, so I decided to put the game up for sale. All components are accounted for and are as they were from the factory. Shipping and handling will cost $9.00 and will be shipped out the following business day after confirmation of payment via payapl. Additionally, a tracking number will be provided once the package has been shipped. If you have any additional questions feel free to send me a message via BGG. I also offer free pickup if the buyer is located in Rochester, NY.

Grading Guide for Books _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Games New - A copy that is as neat and clean as when it was received from the publisher with no unstated damage or defects. Very Fine - A conservative grading for items that appear new but cannot be confirmed or verified as new. Fine - A previously unsold copy or used copy that is virtually perfect with only very light shelf-wear if any at all. Near Fine - A previously unsold or used copy that shows only very light shelf-wear and/or very light reading-wear. Very Good - A used copy that shows light shelf-wear and/or light reading-wear that would still appear collectible to a reasonable person. Good - A reader_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s as opposed to a collector_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s copy but one that nonetheless remains clean with light to moderate shelf-wear and reading-wear. Fair - A perfectly clean and readable copy that shows moderate shelf-wear and reading-wear. Acceptable - A tight and clean well-read and well-worn copy. Poor - Reserved for damaged books that are rare or otherwise have intrinsic value beyond which their condition merits.

Played once or twice. In great condition. Postage costs will vary depending on your location. In the U.K. I normally use MyHermes as they can collect from my location - not all of the couriers do. The cost of shipping within the U.K. is normally between £5-£10 depending on the weight of the game - most of the regular sized (square box) games I am selling tend to be in the 2-5kg category. I always ship with tracking information and enough insurance to cover the cost of the game. Please contact me for a postage quote before purchasing the game.
